page.title: 05Farming
page.content: Farming is the major industry in this area.The 1300 acre{Sydmonton {Court}estate covers a number of small farms in the west.{Adbury Park}estate is in the north_west.The remainder are individual farms,of approximately 200 acres,run as family concerns. Small numbers of pigs, chickens and sheep are reared on smallholdings and farms. Cattle are reared mainly for beef. Milking herds are diminishing due to E.E.C.farm policies. Farming is financially viable but any change or expansion is a gamble because of the uncertainties of political policies.
